org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.instrument.async

Class TraceableExecutorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.instrument.async.TraceableExecutorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, ExecutorService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TraceableScheduledExecutorService

    public class TraceableExecutorService
extends Object
implements ExecutorService
    A decorator class for ExecutorService to support tracing in Executors
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Gaurav Rai Mazra
